DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether NB002 , 0.25 % , 0.5 % safe effective treatment distal subungual onychomycosis toenail .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Mild Moderate Distal Subungual Onychomycosis Toenail
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine whether NB002 , 0.25 % , 0.5 % safe effective treatment distal subungual onychomycosis toenail .
DOC.criteria: healthy male female age 18 75 year age ; clinical diagnosis mild moderate DSO nail least one great toe , involve 25 % 67 % nail , without lunular proximal involvement ; positive mycology result ( ie , KOH test culture dermatophyte ) target great toenail ; refrain use lotion , cream , liquid , polish treat toenail skin immediately adjacent toenail treatment period unless directed investigator ; willing refrain use topical steroid topical antifungal toenail skin immediately adjacent toenail ; systemic antifungal duration study ; female pregnant , plan become pregnant study , nurse child ; hypersensitive topical cream , ointment , medication , surfactant ; receive systemic antifungal therapy reason within 3 month , topical antifungal therapy toenail skin immediately adjacent toenail within 3 week prior start study ; take investigational drug within 4 week prior start study . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
DOC.keyword: chronic persistent infection nail bed plate
